participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and health-conscious, Maya enjoys trying new things and is passionate about her lifestyle choices.
participant_1.background: i am a vegan and i love hummus. i do like watching cooking shows. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and laid-back, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures of life and has a keen interest in sports.
participant_2.background: i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey. i enjoy coloring books.
